00065     class _OgreExport Overlay

00067 
00068     public:
00069               typedef std::list<OverlayContainer*> OverlayContainerList;
00070     protected:
00071         String mName;
00073         SceneNode* mRootNode;
00074         // 2D elements
00075         // OverlayContainers, linked list for easy sorting by zorder later
00076         // Not a map because sort can be saved since changes infrequent (unlike render queue)
00077         OverlayContainerList m2DElements;
00078 
00079         // Degrees of rotation around center
00080         Radian mRotate;
00081         // Scroll values, offsets
00082         Real mScrollX, mScrollY;
00083         // Scale values
00084         Real mScaleX, mScaleY;
00085
